full_summary:
### A&E Consulting Services for Vermilion, AB

#### Tender Announcement

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires the services of Architectural and Engineering professionals for the design, contract administration, delivery, and setup of a detachment facility in Vermilion, Alberta. 

#### Background

The RCMP wishes to construct a new detachment facility in Vermilion, Alberta, to meet the identified program requirements. The facility will serve as a prototype design and be used and customized for other projects. The new facility is anticipated to be approximately 1,117m² of finished space, replacing existing policing facilities that no longer meet operational requirements.

#### Specifications

*   Anticipated facilities size: approximately 1,117 m² of finished space 
*   Facility to be constructed according to Net Zero Carbon compliance standards 
*   Period of contract: five years from contract award 
*   Consultant grants to Canada the option to extend the term of the contract for multiple periods to align with the completion of the construction contract and warranty periods 

#### Notice to Proposers

The RCMP invites proposals from qualified Architects and Engineering professionals to design, administer, deliver, and set up the detachment facility in Vermilion, Alberta. 

#### Notes

*   Security clearance will be required for the selected consultant 
*   The consultant will be required to adhere to the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada 
*   The successful consultant will be required to submit the proposal in accordance with the requirements of the solicitation 

#### Genuine Interest

The RCMP reserves the right to enter into negotiations with any supplier at any stage of the procurement process. 

#### Bidders Details Requirements

*   Documents may be submitted in either English or French 
*   Business profiles can be registered through the Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) 
*   Proposals may be submitted through the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at https://canadabuys.canada.ca 

#### Attachment:

A copy of this tender notice was shared at the following link:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5356/m5000-23-1987a_-vermilion_rfp_ae_e.pdf
